title: Handle IRS Levy on a Bank Account
description: A taxpayer's bank account has been levied by the IRS for an outstanding tax debt. They need immediate help.

tasks.description: Immediately contact the IRS agent assigned to the case to request a temporary hold on the levy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes contact with the IRS to begin negotiations.

tasks.description: Gather financial information to demonstrate that the levy is causing an economic hardship.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles evidence of the hardship.

tasks.description: Negotiate a release of the levy in exchange for setting up an installment agreement or other payment arrangement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully gets the levy released and establishes a payment plan for the client.
